title: Superhero Comic – Overlord’s Path - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Sci-fi   Supernatural
author: 驿路羁旅
description: In the dark mist of chaotic gotham, he's the crimson devil bring the blood,he is sin! For lost mutants, his new force rise, he is stubborn! In the conflict of shield and hydra, he is the sword cut in the war, he is firm! Admired,  detested, praised, cursed, some love him, other hate him. His heart is just like trenchant blade he held, never hesitate, never vacillate, never fluctuate, who can defeat a men like this? Welcome to, the story of the overlord.>
